LiveCycle maven plugin
Last Published: 2013-04-05  | Version: 2.0
LiveCycle maven plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

livecycle:copy-contentspace

Full name:

be.idamediafoundry.sofa.livecycle:livecycle-maven-plugin:2.0:copy-contentspace

Description:

Recursively copies the content of the source server content space to the destination server content space, creating the spaces as needed. The mojo will NOT overwrite any existing content, unless the overwrite configuration parameter is set to true.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
host String - The host name/IP address of the destination LiveCycle server.
User property is: liveCycle.host.
password String - The password used to login to the source LiveCycle server.
User property is: liveCycle.password.
port String - The port number of the destination LiveCycle server.
User property is: liveCycle.port.
protocol String - The protocol which should be used to communicate with the destination LiveCycle server. This can be EJB of SOAP.
Default value is: SOAP.
User property is: liveCycle.protocol.
sourceContentSpacePath String - The source server content space path. This is where copying will start, inclusive this folder. This should be a folder!
User property is: liveCycle.source.contentspace.path.
sourceHost String - The host name/IP address of the source LiveCycle server.
User property is: liveCycle.source.host.
sourcePassword String - The password used to login to the source LiveCycle server.
User property is: liveCycle.source.password.
sourcePort String - The port number of the source LiveCycle server.
User property is: liveCycle.source.port.
sourceProtocol String - The protocol which should be used to communicate with the source LiveCycle server. This can be EJB of SOAP.
Default value is: SOAP.
User property is: liveCycle.source.protocol.
sourceUsername String - The user name used to login to the destination LiveCycle server.
User property is: liveCycle.source.username.
username String - The user name used to login to the destination LiveCycle server.
User property is: liveCycle.username.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
contentSpacePath String - The destination server content space path. This is where copies will end up. This should be a folder! If not set, the same path as the sourceContentSpacePath is used.
User property is: liveCycle.contentspace.path.
overwrite boolean - Flag to mark if copying should overwrite existing content on the destination space (true means overwrite).
Default value is: false.
User property is: liveCycle.contentspace.overwrite.

Parameter Details

contentSpacePath:

The destination server content space path. This is where copies will end up. This should be a folder! If not set, the same path as the sourceContentSpacePath is used.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: liveCycle.contentspace.path

host:

The host name/IP address of the destination LiveCycle server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: liveCycle.host

overwrite:

Flag to mark if copying should overwrite existing content on the destination space (true means overwrite).
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: liveCycle.contentspace.overwrite
  • Default: false

password:

The password used to login to the source LiveCycle server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: liveCycle.password

port:

The port number of the destination LiveCycle server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: liveCycle.port

protocol:

The protocol which should be used to communicate with the destination LiveCycle server. This can be EJB of SOAP.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: liveCycle.protocol
  • Default: SOAP

sourceContentSpacePath:

The source server content space path. This is where copying will start, inclusive this folder. This should be a folder!
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: liveCycle.source.contentspace.path

sourceHost:

The host name/IP address of the source LiveCycle server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: liveCycle.source.host

sourcePassword:

The password used to login to the source LiveCycle server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: liveCycle.source.password

sourcePort:

The port number of the source LiveCycle server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: liveCycle.source.port

sourceProtocol:

The protocol which should be used to communicate with the source LiveCycle server. This can be EJB of SOAP.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: liveCycle.source.protocol
  • Default: SOAP

sourceUsername:

The user name used to login to the destination LiveCycle server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: liveCycle.source.username

username:

The user name used to login to the destination LiveCycle server.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: liveCycle.username
